short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides CMS menu bar on uni-muenster.de pages created by standard CMS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Injects a menu bar with access links to the uni-muenster.de standard CMS if the current page is a uni-muenster.de page. Note that this extension is no longer necessary as of Jan 2022 since the standard Imperia OCE toolbar is now working again in Chrome.

This project is left in the public domain as documented below. 
Although the author is affiliated with the University of Muenster, 
this is a private project which is in no way affiliated with, 
endorsed or supported by the university of Muenster. The names
"University of Muenster" and "WWU" are trademarks of the University
of Muenster.

Revision history:

Rev 2.1: Adapt to new Imperia version.
Rev 1.1: Open documentary links in external windows.
Rev 1.0: Initial revision.
